name: Flouffe Pampering Initiative (Gain Jam 2022)
description:
Flouffe Pampering Initiative is an incremental game where you are an AI with one simple task, pampering the flouves under your care. From your calculations, the most efficient form of pampering is in the form of food, as much food as you can stuff into these space-faring foxes!

Content Warning: This game contains furry weight gain!

This game was made for Weight Gaming's 2022 Gain Jam
